events.title: Screen Speaks
events.desc: Screen Speaks is a paper presentation event where participants present a technical paper on a topic of their choice. The presentation should demonstrate knowledge, clarity, and innovation.
rules: Technical paper should not exceed 4 pages.
Send the paper to the mentioned Gmail Id while registering.

rounds.name: Presentation
rounds.description: Present your paper using slides. Each team gets 7-10 minutes followed by a Q&A session.

events.title: Code Fusion
events.desc: Code Fusion is a competitive programming event where problems must be solved in a strict sequential order. The output of each question serves as the input for the next.
rules: Participants must solve problems in a sequential order.
Participants must submit their solutions within the given time limit.

rounds.name: Prelims
rounds.description: Solve 10 MCQ-based questions on programming fundamentals. Top 20 participants advance.

rounds.name: Relay Round
rounds.description: Solve 5 chained coding problems. The output of each becomes the input for the next. Languages allowed: C, C++, Java, Python.

events.title: Pixel Cut
events.desc: Pixel Cut is a poster making event where participants are given an image and must create a poster based on the theme of the image. The poster should be visually appealing and should convey a message related to technology or computer science.
rules: Participants must create a poster based on the given image.
Participants must submit their poster within the given time limit.

rounds.name: Poster Creation
rounds.description: Participants will be given a theme and an image. They must create a poster that is visually appealing and conveys a message related to technology or computer science.

events.title: Photography
events.desc: Showcase your photography skills in this creative non-technical event. Details will be announced soon.

events.desc: Compete in this thrilling Free Fire gaming tournament. Show your gaming skills and dominate the battlefield!

events.desc: Test your knowledge of iconic dialogues and scenes. Details will be announced soon.

events.title: Bioscope
events.desc: A fast-paced quiz covering general knowledge, aptitude, current affairs, and fun trivia. Teams compete in buzzer rounds to claim the crown.

rounds.name: Prelims
rounds.description: 30 rapid-fire written questions. Top 6 teams advance.

rounds.name: Buzzer Round
rounds.description: Head-to-head buzzer questions with bonus and penalty scoring.

events.desc: A fun-filled carnival event with exciting activities and games. Details will be announced soon.

events.title: Connections
events.desc: Find the hidden connections between seemingly unrelated clues. Details will be announced soon.
